DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the study treatment was dispensed or returned represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Drug Accountability Domain Drug Accountability Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to drug accountability._The date that the drug accountability assessments occurred on.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date the drug ac
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date the drug accountability assessment was performed?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the exact date the study treatment was (dispensed or returned), using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: DADTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable DADTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date study treatment dispensed/returned should be recorded for each dispensation for a study with multiple periods or multiple products dispensed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CTEP Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the study treatment dispense date?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CTEP Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the study treatment returned date?
